links.title: Designer's guide to DPI
links.description: This guide is designed as a 'get started' or introductory read for the starting to intermediate designer who wants to learn or get more knowledge about cross-DPI and cross-platform design from the very beginning. No complex math and un-parsable graph, just straight forward explanations ordered in short sections for you to understand and apply directly to your design process.

links.title: Three-Factor Theory: Create Enthusiasm in Your Work Environment
links.description: Three-factor theory is based on the premise that workers have basic human needs that managers can and should work to address. Creating an environment in which these needs are met results in not just satisfied employees but also enthusiastic employees.
